parameters.name: output_table
parameters.helpText: Full name of destination BigQuery table. Ex: my_project:my_dataset.my_table
parameters.label: Bigquery table to put the results

parameters.name: variables
parameters.helpText: Target variables (or coordinates) for the BigQuery schema. Default: will import all data variables as columns.
parameters.label: Variables to keep

parameters.name: area
parameters.helpText: Target area in [N, W, S, E]. Default: Will include all available area.
parameters.label: Target area in [N, W, S, E]

parameters.name: coordinate_chunk_size
parameters.helpText: this will dictate how fast beam will parallelize the splittable dofn
parameters.label: Intial splitting value

parameters.name: skip_region_validation
parameters.helpText: Skip validation of regions for data migration. Default: off
parameters.label: Skip Region Validation

parameters.name: enable_local_save
parameters.helpText: To enable saving files to each vm Default: off
parameters.label: Enable Local Save

parameters.name: infer_schema
parameters.helpText: Download one file in the URI pattern and infer a schema from that file. Default: off
parameters.label: Infer Schema

parameters.name: public_ips
parameters.helpText: Set true to enable public ip usage. Default: off
parameters.label: Public ips
